title: Rat Funk

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Disease**: Choose a target, any positive effects targeting them tonight or currently affecting them will be cleansed and their abilities will also malfunction.
- **Item Drop** (2x): Give another Koopa some Able juice, Cleansing them and negating the next negative effect that targets them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Examples of malfunctioning: `Attacks saying they killed the target or hit someone with defense while having no effect, Investigations bringing false results, Protective abilities doing nothing and saying the target was attacked when they werent, Supportive abilities giving feedback as if they worked when they do nothing.`
- All Koopas will know what negative effects targeted them and currently affects them at the start of each night, Posted at the Faction chat.
- You can use **Item Drop** twice in a single night, consuming both ammo.

desc:
Post 2116
*They are cowardly creatures, and will often run away from battle. Rat Funks are also extremely fast.*
